SELECT DISTINCT sct.id,s.student_number AS studentNumber, s.name,s.phone,sct.score,c.start_stime AS startStime,s.email AS sEmail,t.email AS tEmail,c.`name` As cname,c.end_etime AS endEtime,t.`name` AS tname,t.phone AS tphone from t_student s , t_student_course_teacher sct, t_course c, t_course_teacher ct, t_teacher t where s.id = sct.student_id
AND s.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and t.id = sct.teacher_id and c.id = sct.course_id

SELECT ct.id, c. NAME, t. NAME teachersName, c.credit, ( SELECT d.dict_value FROM t_sys_dict d WHERE d.dict_type_code = 'COURSE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code = c.course_type ) AS courseTypeName FROM t_teacher t INNER JOIN t_course_teacher ct ON t.id = ct.teacher_id INNER JOIN t_course c ON ct.course_id = c.id AND c.id not IN (SELECT g.course_id FROM t_grade g WHERE g.student_id = #{studentId}) ORDER BY c.credit DESC

SELECT c. NAME, t. NAME teachersName, c.credit, (select t1.score from t_grade t1 WHERE t1.course_id=c.id) score, (select t1.`status` from t_grade t1 WHERE t1.course_id=c.id) status, ( SELECT d.dict_value FROM t_sys_dict d WHERE d.dict_type_code = 'COURSE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code = c.course_type ) AS courseTypeName FROM t_teacher t INNER JOIN t_course_teacher ct ON t.id = ct.teacher_id INNER JOIN t_course c ON ct.course_id = c.id AND c.id IN (SELECT g.course_id FROM t_grade g WHERE g.teacher_id = t.id and g.student_id = #{studentId}) ORDER BY c.credit DESC

SELECT ct.id, c.name, c.credit, (select d.dict_value from t_sys_dict d WHERE d.dict_type_code='COURSE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code=c.course_type) AS courseTypeName, (select count(*) from t_grade t1 WHERE t1.course_id=c.id) studentNum FROM t_course c INNER JOIN t_course_teacher ct ON c.id = ct.course_id INNER JOIN t_teacher t ON ct.teacher_id = t.id AND t.id=#{teacherId}
